trans-unit.source: ＊ Without a specific purpose, do not manipulate the valves and cocks attached to or supplied for the pump.

trans-unit.source: This manual has been prepared for the standard motor-driven gear pumps used for the convenience of persons concerned with handling pumps.

seg-source.mrk: This manual has been prepared for the standard motor-driven gear pumps used for the convenience of persons concerned with handling pumps.

target.mrk: This manual has been prepared for the standard motor-driven gear pumps used for the convenience of persons concerned with handling pumps.

trans-unit.source: This manual is applicable to A. C. motor-driven ordinary pumps such as lubricating oil, fuel oil and fuel valve cooling oil pumps. ( hereinafter called pumps. )

seg-source.mrk: This manual is applicable to A. C. motor-driven ordinary pumps such as lubricating oil, fuel oil and fuel valve cooling oil pumps.

target.mrk: This manual is applicable to A. C. motor-driven ordinary pumps such as lubricating oil, fuel oil and fuel valve cooling oil pumps.

trans-unit.source: This pump has in its casing one set of gear and shaft supported with bearings and liquid is contained between the teeth. With the rotation of the gear, liquid is continuously discharged around the casing inside. ( See the reference figure )

seg-source.mrk: This pump has in its casing one set of gear and shaft supported with bearings and liquid is contained between the teeth.
With the rotation of the gear, liquid is continuously discharged around the casing inside.

target.mrk: This pump has in its casing one set of gear and shaft supported with bearings and liquid is contained between the teeth.
With the rotation of the gear, liquid is continuously discharged around the casing inside.

trans-unit.source: The bearings located inside the seal section are self-lubricated with the liquid.

seg-source.mrk: The bearings located inside the seal section are self-lubricated with the liquid.

target.mrk: The bearings located inside the seal section are self-lubricated with the liquid.

trans-unit.source: The lubrication liquid is supplied to oil passage through oil openings provided on the discharge side and is returned to the suction side after lubrication of the bearings.

seg-source.mrk: The lubrication liquid is supplied to oil passage through oil openings provided on the discharge side and is returned to the suction side after lubrication of the bearings.

target.mrk: The lubrication liquid is supplied to oil passage through oil openings provided on the discharge side and is returned to the suction side after lubrication of the bearings.

trans-unit.source: The safety valve protects the pump or the motor by opening the port and by-passing the liquid to the suction side when the discharge pressure rises abnormally higher than the set pressure.

seg-source.mrk: The safety valve protects the pump or the motor by opening the port and by-passing the liquid to the suction side when the discharge pressure rises abnormally higher than the set pressure.

target.mrk: The safety valve protects the pump or the motor by opening the port and by-passing the liquid to the suction side when the discharge pressure rises abnormally higher than the set pressure.

trans-unit.source: <run1>Reference : The procedure for controlling the set pressure is that after the adjust screw of</run1>

seg-source.mrk: <run1>Reference : The procedure for controlling the set pressure is that after the adjust screw of</run1>

target.mrk: <run1>Reference : The procedure for controlling the set pressure is that after the adjust screw of</run1>

trans-unit.source: the safety valve is fully tightened with discharge suction valves fully open, these

seg-source.mrk: the safety valve is fully tightened with discharge suction valves fully open, these

target.mrk: the safety valve is fully tightened with discharge suction valves fully open, these

trans-unit.source: valves are gradually closed to set the discharge pressure at the set pressure and

seg-source.mrk: valves are gradually closed to set the discharge pressure at the set pressure and

target.mrk: valves are gradually closed to set the discharge pressure at the set pressure and

trans-unit.source: the suction pressure at -380mmHg. Then the adjust screw is slowly loosed and

seg-source.mrk: Then the adjust screw is slowly loosed and

target.mrk: Then the adjust screw is slowly loosed and

trans-unit.source: locked at a point where the discharge pressure or the suction pressure fluctuates

seg-source.mrk: locked at a point where the discharge pressure or the suction pressure fluctuates

target.mrk: locked at a point where the discharge pressure or the suction pressure fluctuates

trans-unit.source: very slowly. When control is over pump operation is started with discharge

trans-unit.source: In transport it is necessary to proceed as follows.

seg-source.mrk: In transport it is necessary to proceed as follows.

target.mrk: In transport it is necessary to proceed as follows.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>When lifting, pay attention to safety in respect to the weight of the units lifted and the method of using wires.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>When lifting, pay attention to safety in respect to the weight of the units lifted and the method of using wires.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>When lifting, pay attention to safety in respect to the weight of the units lifted and the method of using wires.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>Be careful to avoid damage to accessories such as piping, valves, cocks, etc.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>Be careful to avoid damage to accessories such as piping, valves, cocks, etc.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>Be careful to avoid damage to accessories such as piping, valves, cocks, etc.

trans-unit.source: In order to minimize the vibration of pump and piping, pay sufficient attention to the reinforcement of pump foundation and piping supports.

seg-source.mrk: In order to minimize the vibration of pump and piping, pay sufficient attention to the reinforcement of pump foundation and piping supports.

target.mrk: In order to minimize the vibration of pump and piping, pay sufficient attention to the reinforcement of pump foundation and piping supports.

trans-unit.source: In installation, pay attention as follows

seg-source.mrk: In installation, pay attention as follows

target.mrk: In installation, pay attention as follows

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Pump foundation must be as rigid and strong as practical.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Pump foundation must be as rigid and strong as practical.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Pump foundation must be as rigid and strong as practical.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>Considering operation and overhaul, give as ample space as possible.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>Considering operation and overhaul, give as ample space as possible.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>Considering operation and overhaul, give as ample space as possible.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>Location of installation must be determined in consideration of pump suction head.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>Location of installation must be determined in consideration of pump suction head.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>Location of installation must be determined in consideration of pump suction head.

trans-unit.source: Sufficient attention must be given to piping since it has a great effect on pump performance.

seg-source.mrk: Sufficient attention must be given to piping since it has a great effect on pump performance.

target.mrk: Sufficient attention must be given to piping since it has a great effect on pump performance.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Suction pipe must be as short as possible, and bends must be as few as possible to minimize friction loss.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Suction pipe must be as short as possible, and bends must be as few as possible to minimize friction loss.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Suction pipe must be as short as possible, and bends must be as few as possible to minimize friction loss.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>Suction pipe must be free from air pocket or air invasion.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>Suction pipe must be free from air pocket or air invasion.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>Suction pipe must be free from air pocket or air invasion.

trans-unit.source: c.<tags1/>Valves on the suction side must be guarded against air invasion through the gland.

seg-source.mrk: c.<tags1/>Valves on the suction side must be guarded against air invasion through the gland.

target.mrk: c.<tags1/>Valves on the suction side must be guarded against air invasion through the gland.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>Filter must be provided on the suction side for pump protection.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>Filter must be provided on the suction side for pump protection.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>Filter must be provided on the suction side for pump protection.

trans-unit.source: e.<tags1/>Flanges connecting to the suction and discharge nozzles should be placed correctly in order to avoid disturbance of pump alignment when flange bolts are unduly tightened.

seg-source.mrk: e.<tags1/>Flanges connecting to the suction and discharge nozzles should be placed correctly in order to avoid disturbance of pump alignment when flange bolts are unduly tightened.

target.mrk: e.<tags1/>Flanges connecting to the suction and discharge nozzles should be placed correctly in order to avoid disturbance of pump alignment when flange bolts are unduly tightened.

trans-unit.source: f.<tags1/>Precautions must be taken so that expansion and contraction due to temperature and weight of piping and valves may not abnormally affect the pump. And at the same time, precautions must be taken to avoid misalignment of the flange caused by pipe vibration.

seg-source.mrk: f.<tags1/>Precautions must be taken so that expansion and contraction due to temperature and weight of piping and valves may not abnormally affect the pump.
And at the same time, precautions must be taken to avoid misalignment of the flange caused by pipe vibration.

target.mrk: f.<tags1/>Precautions must be taken so that expansion and contraction due to temperature and weight of piping and valves may not abnormally affect the pump.
And at the same time, precautions must be taken to avoid misalignment of the flange caused by pipe vibration.

trans-unit.source: g.<tags1/>Interior of the piping must be as clean as possible.

seg-source.mrk: g.<tags1/>Interior of the piping must be as clean as possible.

target.mrk: g.<tags1/>Interior of the piping must be as clean as possible.

trans-unit.source: On completing installation, the alignment must be checked and care must be taken so that no misalignment will occur after connecting with piping. Since alignment is duly carried out in the factory, unreasonable readjustment should be avoided.

seg-source.mrk: On completing installation, the alignment must be checked and care must be taken so that no misalignment will occur after connecting with piping.
Since alignment is duly carried out in the factory, unreasonable readjustment should be avoided.

target.mrk: On completing installation, the alignment must be checked and care must be taken so that no misalignment will occur after connecting with piping.
Since alignment is duly carried out in the factory, unreasonable readjustment should be avoided.

trans-unit.source: Even though misalignment occurs, readjustment must be made carefully by loosening both of the bolts on the suction and discharge flanges and the foundation. After the alignment is made a knock pin shall be inserted.

seg-source.mrk: Even though misalignment occurs, readjustment must be made carefully by loosening both of the bolts on the suction and discharge flanges and the foundation.
After the alignment is made a knock pin shall be inserted.

target.mrk: Even though misalignment occurs, readjustment must be made carefully by loosening both of the bolts on the suction and discharge flanges and the foundation.
After the alignment is made a knock pin shall be inserted.

trans-unit.source: For Horizontal pump, it is desirable that adjustment be made by inserting a liner between common bedplate and foundation, but if necessary, shims can be placed between common bedplate and motor base.

seg-source.mrk: For Horizontal pump, it is desirable that adjustment be made by inserting a liner between common bedplate and foundation, but if necessary, shims can be placed between common bedplate and motor base.

target.mrk: For Horizontal pump, it is desirable that adjustment be made by inserting a liner between common bedplate and foundation, but if necessary, shims can be placed between common bedplate and motor base.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Untighten the bolts of the shaft coupling between pump and motor and check the alignment at four points, 90°apart, on the coupling periphery.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Untighten the bolts of the shaft coupling between pump and motor and check the alignment at four points, 90°apart, on the coupling periphery.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Untighten the bolts of the shaft coupling between pump and motor and check the alignment at four points, 90°apart, on the coupling periphery.

trans-unit.source: For comparing the distance between the faces, fix a dial indicator on the shaft coupling of the motor side as shown in Fig.1(a)and give the motor coupling one complete rotation by hand. Then half of the

seg-source.mrk: For comparing the distance between the faces, fix a dial indicator on the shaft coupling of the motor side as shown in Fig.1(a)and give the motor coupling one complete rotation by hand.

target.mrk: For comparing the distance between the faces, fix a dial indicator on the shaft coupling of the motor side as shown in Fig.1(a)and give the motor coupling one complete rotation by hand.

trans-unit.source: <run1>variation in readings is taken as the value of measurement, which must comply with the value in Table 1.</run1>

seg-source.mrk: <run1>variation in readings is taken as the value of measurement, which must comply with the value in Table 1.</run1>

target.mrk: <run1>variation in readings is taken as the value of measurement, which must comply with the value in Table 1.</run1>

trans-unit.source: c.<tags1/>For measuring the clearance between coupling faces, insert a thickness gauge at four points of equal interval as shown in Fig.1(b). Then the value of measurement, which must comply with the value in Table 2.

seg-source.mrk: c.<tags1/>For measuring the clearance between coupling faces, insert a thickness gauge at four points of equal interval as shown in Fig.1(b).
Then the value of measurement, which must comply with the value in Table 2.

target.mrk: c.<tags1/>For measuring the clearance between coupling faces, insert a thickness gauge at four points of equal interval as shown in Fig.1(b).
Then the value of measurement, which must comply with the value in Table 2.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>Ensure the rotating direction of the motor.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>Ensure the rotating direction of the motor.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>Ensure the rotating direction of the motor.

trans-unit.source: f.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see whether it rotates smoothly.

seg-source.mrk: f.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see whether it rotates smoothly.

target.mrk: f.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see whether it rotates smoothly.

trans-unit.source: <run1>Note : A thickness gauge should be adopted for alignment only at the times of repair, intermediate inspection and </run1>

seg-source.mrk: <run1>Note : A thickness gauge should be adopted for alignment only at the times of repair, intermediate inspection and </run1>

target.mrk: <run1>Note : A thickness gauge should be adopted for alignment only at the times of repair, intermediate inspection and </run1>

trans-unit.source: periodical inspection. It is preferable to use a dial indicator for checkup after initial installation or piping

seg-source.mrk: It is preferable to use a dial indicator for checkup after initial installation or piping

target.mrk: It is preferable to use a dial indicator for checkup after initial installation or piping

trans-unit.source: * Use straight edge or a caliper ( pass) as shown in Fig.1 or Fig.2.

seg-source.mrk: * Use straight edge or a caliper ( pass) as shown in Fig.1 or Fig.2.

target.mrk: * Use straight edge or a caliper ( pass) as shown in Fig.1 or Fig.2.

trans-unit.source: * Adjust alignment to comply with the values shown in table 1.

seg-source.mrk: * Adjust alignment to comply with the values shown in table 1.

target.mrk: * Adjust alignment to comply with the values shown in table 1.

trans-unit.source: * Confirm motor rotating direction and that pump turns smoothly by hands.

seg-source.mrk: * Confirm motor rotating direction and that pump turns smoothly by hands.

target.mrk: * Confirm motor rotating direction and that pump turns smoothly by hands.

trans-unit.source: Operation after installation or reassemble must be carried out in the following order.

seg-source.mrk: Operation after installation or reassemble must be carried out in the following order.

target.mrk: Operation after installation or reassemble must be carried out in the following order.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Fully open the valves of both suction and discharge sides.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Fully open the valves of both suction and discharge sides.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Fully open the valves of both suction and discharge sides.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>Open the air vent valve (or cock) on the casing top to fill the casing with liquid.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>Open the air vent valve (or cock) on the casing top to fill the casing with liquid.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>Open the air vent valve (or cock) on the casing top to fill the casing with liquid.

trans-unit.source: c.<tags1/>If the pump is located above the suction level, pull the plug out of the casing top and fill the casing with oil while rotating the pump by hand in order to fully spread oil over the teeth and the bearings. Keep the air vent plug (or cock) on the discharge side open.

seg-source.mrk: c.<tags1/>If the pump is located above the suction level, pull the plug out of the casing top and fill the casing with oil while rotating the pump by hand in order to fully spread oil over the teeth and the bearings.
Keep the air vent plug (or cock) on the discharge side open.

target.mrk: c.<tags1/>If the pump is located above the suction level, pull the plug out of the casing top and fill the casing with oil while rotating the pump by hand in order to fully spread oil over the teeth and the bearings.
Keep the air vent plug (or cock) on the discharge side open.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>See that the cock (or plug) of the pressure gauge and compound gauge is open.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>See that the cock (or plug) of the pressure gauge and compound gauge is open.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>See that the cock (or plug) of the pressure gauge and compound gauge is open.

trans-unit.source: e.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see whether it turns smoothly.

seg-source.mrk: e.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see whether it turns smoothly.

target.mrk: e.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see whether it turns smoothly.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Start the motor, but at first repeat “ON” and “OFF” operations once or twice and enter into operation on confirming that there is no abnormal condition with respect to rotating direction, noise, vibration, starting current, etc.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Start the motor, but at first repeat “ON” and “OFF” operations once or twice and enter into operation on confirming that there is no abnormal condition with respect to rotating direction, noise, vibration, starting current, etc.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Start the motor, but at first repeat “ON” and “OFF” operations once or twice and enter into operation on confirming that there is no abnormal condition with respect to rotating direction, noise, vibration, starting current, etc.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>Tighten the air vent plug (or cock) after speed has risen, and air is discharged from the air vent and liquid is pumped up in some time. If liquid is not pumped up in about 30 seconds after start-up, stop the motor and check the cause.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>Tighten the air vent plug (or cock) after speed has risen, and air is discharged from the air vent and liquid is pumped up in some time.
If liquid is not pumped up in about 30 seconds after start-up, stop the motor and check the cause.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>Tighten the air vent plug (or cock) after speed has risen, and air is discharged from the air vent and liquid is pumped up in some time.
If liquid is not pumped up in about 30 seconds after start-up, stop the motor and check the cause.

trans-unit.source: c.<tags1/>Avoid dry operation absolutely as the sliding contact surfaces of the bearings, the teeth and the mechanical seal are of self-lubrication construction.

seg-source.mrk: c.<tags1/>Avoid dry operation absolutely as the sliding contact surfaces of the bearings, the teeth and the mechanical seal are of self-lubrication construction.

target.mrk: c.<tags1/>Avoid dry operation absolutely as the sliding contact surfaces of the bearings, the teeth and the mechanical seal are of self-lubrication construction.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>Pay a careful attention in the winter season because there may be a fear of excessive torque of motor and abnormal noise and vibration of pump caused by oil viscosity increase. Some treatment such as heating is preferable.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>Pay a careful attention in the winter season because there may be a fear of excessive torque of motor and abnormal noise and vibration of pump caused by oil viscosity increase.
Some treatment such as heating is preferable.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>Pay a careful attention in the winter season because there may be a fear of excessive torque of motor and abnormal noise and vibration of pump caused by oil viscosity increase.
Some treatment such as heating is preferable.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>After stopping the pump, close the suction valve and then close the discharge valve.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>After stopping the pump, close the suction valve and then close the discharge valve.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>After stopping the pump, close the suction valve and then close the discharge valve.

trans-unit.source: In order to maintain an efficient operation over a long period, the utmost care must be taken.

seg-source.mrk: In order to maintain an efficient operation over a long period, the utmost care must be taken.

target.mrk: In order to maintain an efficient operation over a long period, the utmost care must be taken.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Try to operate the pump within the range of the design condition.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Try to operate the pump within the range of the design condition.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Try to operate the pump within the range of the design condition.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>Check the vibration, noise, pressure gauge and ammeter. If abnormal condition is surveyed stop the pump immediately. Particularly, for the pump provided with a mechanical seal, protect against vibration in view of the service life of the mechanical seal.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>Check the vibration, noise, pressure gauge and ammeter.
If abnormal condition is surveyed stop the pump immediately.
Particularly, for the pump provided with a mechanical seal, protect against vibration in view of the service life of the mechanical seal.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>Check the vibration, noise, pressure gauge and ammeter.
If abnormal condition is surveyed stop the pump immediately.
Particularly, for the pump provided with a mechanical seal, protect against vibration in view of the service life of the mechanical seal.

trans-unit.source: c.<tags1/>Pay attention to bearing temperature rise. If the bearing housing can be felt by hand safely, there is no fear, otherwise, measure the temperature with a thermometer. Keep the permissible bearing temperature at “ambient temperature plus 40℃” or “liquid temperature plus 20℃”. If low viscosity oil outside the range of design condition, be careful as the bearings and the gear may be seized.

seg-source.mrk: c.<tags1/>Pay attention to bearing temperature rise.
If the bearing housing can be felt by hand safely, there is no fear, otherwise, measure the temperature with a thermometer.
Keep the permissible bearing temperature at “ambient temperature plus 40℃” or “liquid temperature plus 20℃”.
If low viscosity oil outside the range of design condition, be careful as the bearings and the gear may be seized.

target.mrk: c.<tags1/>Pay attention to bearing temperature rise.
If the bearing housing can be felt by hand safely, there is no fear, otherwise, measure the temperature with a thermometer.
Keep the permissible bearing temperature at “ambient temperature plus 40℃” or “liquid temperature plus 20℃”.
If low viscosity oil outside the range of design condition, be careful as the bearings and the gear may be seized.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>Keep a small amount of continuous leak from the gland. Too hard tightening of the packing will cause premature wear of the shaft and the sleeve, overheating and overload. Especially pay a careful attention to a case where oil of high temperature or low viscosity is used.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>Keep a small amount of continuous leak from the gland.
Too hard tightening of the packing will cause premature wear of the shaft and the sleeve, overheating and overload.
Especially pay a careful attention to a case where oil of high temperature or low viscosity is used.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>Keep a small amount of continuous leak from the gland.
Too hard tightening of the packing will cause premature wear of the shaft and the sleeve, overheating and overload.
Especially pay a careful attention to a case where oil of high temperature or low viscosity is used.

trans-unit.source: e.<tags1/>When a mechanical seal is used, oil leak is generally very small. If oil leaks in drips, check the seal.

seg-source.mrk: e.<tags1/>When a mechanical seal is used, oil leak is generally very small.
If oil leaks in drips, check the seal.

target.mrk: e.<tags1/>When a mechanical seal is used, oil leak is generally very small.
If oil leaks in drips, check the seal.

trans-unit.source: f.<tags1/>Never throttle the valve on the suction and discharge sides. Adjust the flow by means of the by-pass valve on the discharge side.

seg-source.mrk: f.<tags1/>Never throttle the valve on the suction and discharge sides.
Adjust the flow by means of the by-pass valve on the discharge side.

target.mrk: f.<tags1/>Never throttle the valve on the suction and discharge sides.
Adjust the flow by means of the by-pass valve on the discharge side.

trans-unit.source: g.<tags1/>Never operate with the valve closed on the discharge side, otherwise a temperature rise of the liquid in the casing will cause seizure.

seg-source.mrk: g.<tags1/>Never operate with the valve closed on the discharge side, otherwise a temperature rise of the liquid in the casing will cause seizure.

target.mrk: g.<tags1/>Never operate with the valve closed on the discharge side, otherwise a temperature rise of the liquid in the casing will cause seizure.

trans-unit.source: h. See whether the stand by pump is reversing due to the leakage from its non return valve.

seg-source.mrk: See whether the stand by pump is reversing due to the leakage from its non return valve.

target.mrk: See whether the stand by pump is reversing due to the leakage from its non return valve.

trans-unit.source: i.<tags1/>In the case of a pump with automatic starting and stopping device, check the pressure at the start and stop of pump as well as the interval of operation, and if the interval is too short, check the system.

seg-source.mrk: i.<tags1/>In the case of a pump with automatic starting and stopping device, check the pressure at the start and stop of pump as well as the interval of operation, and if the interval is too short, check the system.

target.mrk: i.<tags1/>In the case of a pump with automatic starting and stopping device, check the pressure at the start and stop of pump as well as the interval of operation, and if the interval is too short, check the system.

trans-unit.source: j.<tags1/>In the case of automatic operation under central control system, take care of the indication of gauge on the control panel board.

seg-source.mrk: j.<tags1/>In the case of automatic operation under central control system, take care of the indication of gauge on the control panel board.

target.mrk: j.<tags1/>In the case of automatic operation under central control system, take care of the indication of gauge on the control panel board.

trans-unit.source: k.<tags1/>Keep the strainer clean to avoid clogging.

seg-source.mrk: k.<tags1/>Keep the strainer clean to avoid clogging.

target.mrk: k.<tags1/>Keep the strainer clean to avoid clogging.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Keep closed the discharge and suction valves. But such valves must be kept open in a case where the pump is of auto start type with a foot valve or a check valve, where the pump is under positive suction head or where oil is accumulated in the pump casing in some way or other.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Keep closed the discharge and suction valves.

But such valves must be kept open in a case where the pump is of auto start type with a foot valve or a check valve, where the pump is under positive suction head or where oil is accumulated in the pump casing in some way or other.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Keep closed the discharge and suction valves.

But such valves must be kept open in a case where the pump is of auto start type with a foot valve or a check valve, where the pump is under positive suction head or where oil is accumulated in the pump casing in some way or other.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>When the pump is shut down over a long period, the pump must be rotated by hand or motor periodically. ( once a week or so )

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>When the pump is shut down over a long period, the pump must be rotated by hand or motor periodically.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>When the pump is shut down over a long period, the pump must be rotated by hand or motor periodically.

trans-unit.source: Excepting the case of abnormal conditions, it is desirable to carry out inspection periodically in the following way, but since it varies according to the method of mounting, place of installation, liquid handled, etc. It is preferable that the operator should make a final plan of inspection in accordance with conditions.

seg-source.mrk: Excepting the case of abnormal conditions, it is desirable to carry out inspection periodically in the following way, but since it varies according to the method of mounting, place of installation, liquid handled, etc.
It is preferable that the operator should make a final plan of inspection in accordance with conditions.

target.mrk: Excepting the case of abnormal conditions, it is desirable to carry out inspection periodically in the following way, but since it varies according to the method of mounting, place of installation, liquid handled, etc.
It is preferable that the operator should make a final plan of inspection in accordance with conditions.

trans-unit.source: Check up inner and outer races as well as balls for exfoliation, and if its trance is found, renew it.

seg-source.mrk: Check up inner and outer races as well as balls for exfoliation, and if its trance is found, renew it.

target.mrk: Check up inner and outer races as well as balls for exfoliation, and if its trance is found, renew it.

trans-unit.source: Check up sliding surfaces for conditions

seg-source.mrk: Check up sliding surfaces for conditions

target.mrk: Check up sliding surfaces for conditions

trans-unit.source: of contact and flaw. Measure inside
Check up condition of fitting and amount

seg-source.mrk: Check up condition of fitting and amount

target.mrk: Check up condition of fitting and amount

trans-unit.source: of leakage. Renew it if leakage is too

seg-source.mrk: Renew it if leakage is too

target.mrk: Renew it if leakage is too

trans-unit.source: Check up condition of mating faces.

seg-source.mrk: Check up condition of mating faces.

target.mrk: Check up condition of mating faces.

trans-unit.source: Check up conditions of contact, flaw in

seg-source.mrk: Check up conditions of contact, flaw in

target.mrk: Check up conditions of contact, flaw in

trans-unit.source: diameter of journal and treat it

seg-source.mrk: diameter of journal and treat it

target.mrk: diameter of journal and treat it

trans-unit.source: Check up surface flaw and condition of

seg-source.mrk: Check up surface flaw and condition of

target.mrk: Check up surface flaw and condition of

trans-unit.source: Throttle the discharge valve to raise

seg-source.mrk: Throttle the discharge valve to raise

target.mrk: Throttle the discharge valve to raise

trans-unit.source: Check up tooth surfaces and condition of

seg-source.mrk: Check up tooth surfaces and condition of

target.mrk: Check up tooth surfaces and condition of

trans-unit.source: its setting to the shaft. Measure the
outside diameter and width and treat it

seg-source.mrk: outside diameter and width and treat it

target.mrk: outside diameter and width and treat it

trans-unit.source: Check up conditions of wear and renew

seg-source.mrk: Check up conditions of wear and renew

target.mrk: Check up conditions of wear and renew

trans-unit.source: them if abnormal points are found.

seg-source.mrk: them if abnormal points are found.

target.mrk: them if abnormal points are found.

trans-unit.source: See to it that the foundation bolts are

seg-source.mrk: See to it that the foundation bolts are

target.mrk: See to it that the foundation bolts are

trans-unit.source: <run1>Note : The hours quoted refer to the operating hours. </run1>

seg-source.mrk: <run1>Note : The hours quoted refer to the operating hours.

target.mrk: <run1>Note : The hours quoted refer to the operating hours.

trans-unit.source: When overhauling the pump, attention must be paid as follows.

seg-source.mrk: When overhauling the pump, attention must be paid as follows.

target.mrk: When overhauling the pump, attention must be paid as follows.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Understand the construction well by referring to the assembly drawing and make no mistake in the order of overhaul.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Understand the construction well by referring to the assembly drawing and make no mistake in the order of overhaul.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Understand the construction well by referring to the assembly drawing and make no mistake in the order of overhaul.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>When separating fit and flange faces, use jack bolts and wooden hammers, and never apply force with chisels or drivers.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>When separating fit and flange faces, use jack bolts and wooden hammers, and never apply force with chisels or drivers.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>When separating fit and flange faces, use jack bolts and wooden hammers, and never apply force with chisels or drivers.

trans-unit.source: c.<tags1/>When removing the rotating element, take care to avoid flaw on sliding faces and machined surfaces. It is preferable not to overhaul the mechanical seal unless there is anything abnormal.

seg-source.mrk: c.<tags1/>When removing the rotating element, take care to avoid flaw on sliding faces and machined surfaces.
It is preferable not to overhaul the mechanical seal unless there is anything abnormal.

target.mrk: c.<tags1/>When removing the rotating element, take care to avoid flaw on sliding faces and machined surfaces.
It is preferable not to overhaul the mechanical seal unless there is anything abnormal.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>When removing rotating parts from the shaft, draw off each one carefully after removing the locking device.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>When removing rotating parts from the shaft, draw off each one carefully after removing the locking device.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>When removing rotating parts from the shaft, draw off each one carefully after removing the locking device.

trans-unit.source: e.<tags1/>Handle the longsized-parts such as shaft carefully so that it may not bend.

seg-source.mrk: e.<tags1/>Handle the longsized-parts such as shaft carefully so that it may not bend.

target.mrk: e.<tags1/>Handle the longsized-parts such as shaft carefully so that it may not bend.

trans-unit.source: f.<tags1/>Handle the parts carefully, by arranging them on sheets of paper or cloth in good order.

seg-source.mrk: f.<tags1/>Handle the parts carefully, by arranging them on sheets of paper or cloth in good order.

target.mrk: f.<tags1/>Handle the parts carefully, by arranging them on sheets of paper or cloth in good order.

trans-unit.source: g.<tags1/>At overhauling, put suitable match marks as many as possible to avoid mistakes when reassembling.

seg-source.mrk: g.<tags1/>At overhauling, put suitable match marks as many as possible to avoid mistakes when reassembling.

target.mrk: g.<tags1/>At overhauling, put suitable match marks as many as possible to avoid mistakes when reassembling.

trans-unit.source: Carry out assembly, by reversing the order of disassembly and paying attention as follows.

seg-source.mrk: Carry out assembly, by reversing the order of disassembly and paying attention as follows.

target.mrk: Carry out assembly, by reversing the order of disassembly and paying attention as follows.

trans-unit.source: a.<tags1/>Remove dust and stain from each part by washing it thoroughly with kerosene. Repair it if flaw is found.

seg-source.mrk: a.<tags1/>Remove dust and stain from each part by washing it thoroughly with kerosene.
Repair it if flaw is found.

target.mrk: a.<tags1/>Remove dust and stain from each part by washing it thoroughly with kerosene.
Repair it if flaw is found.

trans-unit.source: b.<tags1/>Fit the locking device perfectly in each rotating part if necessary.

seg-source.mrk: b.<tags1/>Fit the locking device perfectly in each rotating part if necessary.

target.mrk: b.<tags1/>Fit the locking device perfectly in each rotating part if necessary.

trans-unit.source: c.<tags1/>When fitting the parts with match marks such as fittings and gear, be sure to follow them.

seg-source.mrk: c.<tags1/>When fitting the parts with match marks such as fittings and gear, be sure to follow them.

target.mrk: c.<tags1/>When fitting the parts with match marks such as fittings and gear, be sure to follow them.

trans-unit.source: d.<tags1/>Before assembling the sliding contact faces of the bearings, tooth faces and mechanical seal, apply enough clean lube oil to them.

seg-source.mrk: d.<tags1/>Before assembling the sliding contact faces of the bearings, tooth faces and mechanical seal, apply enough clean lube oil to them.

target.mrk: d.<tags1/>Before assembling the sliding contact faces of the bearings, tooth faces and mechanical seal, apply enough clean lube oil to them.

trans-unit.source: e.<tags1/>When fitting the bearings and side cover, take into account the position of oil channel for bearing lube oil and return oil and the direction of pump discharge and suction.

seg-source.mrk: e.<tags1/>When fitting the bearings and side cover, take into account the position of oil channel for bearing lube oil and return oil and the direction of pump discharge and suction.

target.mrk: e.<tags1/>When fitting the bearings and side cover, take into account the position of oil channel for bearing lube oil and return oil and the direction of pump discharge and suction.

trans-unit.source: f.<tags1/>Insert each packing in good order softly one by one from the bottom, staggering each joint by 90°or 180°to a fixed position and support it lightly with the packing gland.

seg-source.mrk: f.<tags1/>Insert each packing in good order softly one by one from the bottom, staggering each joint by 90°or 180°to a fixed position and support it lightly with the packing gland.

target.mrk: f.<tags1/>Insert each packing in good order softly one by one from the bottom, staggering each joint by 90°or 180°to a fixed position and support it lightly with the packing gland.

trans-unit.source: g.<tags1/>Carefully fit the mechanical seal and then confirm its movement by hand.

seg-source.mrk: g.<tags1/>Carefully fit the mechanical seal and then confirm its movement by hand.

target.mrk: g.<tags1/>Carefully fit the mechanical seal and then confirm its movement by hand.

trans-unit.source: h.<tags1/>Tighten the bolts with an equal force.

seg-source.mrk: h.<tags1/>Tighten the bolts with an equal force.

target.mrk: h.<tags1/>Tighten the bolts with an equal force.

trans-unit.source: i.<tags1/>Check up the alignment as mentioned in Section 8.

seg-source.mrk: i.<tags1/>Check up the alignment as mentioned in Section 8.

target.mrk: i.<tags1/>Check up the alignment as mentioned in Section 8.

trans-unit.source: j.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see that it turns smoothly.

seg-source.mrk: j.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see that it turns smoothly.

target.mrk: j.<tags1/>Rotate the pump by hand to see that it turns smoothly.

trans-unit.source: Should troubles occur, their causes must be traced and necessary remedies must be carried out.

seg-source.mrk: Should troubles occur, their causes must be traced and necessary remedies must be carried out.

target.mrk: Should troubles occur, their causes must be traced and necessary remedies must be carried out.

trans-unit.source: The following, for instance, can be conceivable as troubles.

seg-source.mrk: The following, for instance, can be conceivable as troubles.

target.mrk: The following, for instance, can be conceivable as troubles.

trans-unit.source: ・Pump is not well filled with oil.

seg-source.mrk: ・Pump is not well filled with oil.

target.mrk: ・Pump is not well filled with oil.

trans-unit.source: exists on bearing side or whether

seg-source.mrk: exists on bearing side or whether

target.mrk: exists on bearing side or whether

trans-unit.source: but vibration and accidential noise takes

seg-source.mrk: but vibration and accidential noise takes

target.mrk: but vibration and accidential noise takes

trans-unit.source: <run1>In case troubles cannot be remedied in spite of the above counter-measures, the </run1>causes may

seg-source.mrk: <run1>In case troubles cannot be remedied in spite of the above counter-measures, the </run1>causes may

target.mrk: <run1>In case troubles cannot be remedied in spite of the above counter-measures, the </run1>causes may

trans-unit.source: be in the design conditions of the pump, so it is preferable to consult manufacturer.

seg-source.mrk: be in the design conditions of the pump, so it is preferable to consult manufacturer.

target.mrk: be in the design conditions of the pump, so it is preferable to consult manufacturer.
